thread.title: One-hour SEX BREAK proposed for horny office workers
thread.title_full: One-hour SEX BREAK proposed for horny office workers

title: One-hour SEX BREAK proposed for horny office workers
text:
GETTY SEXY TIME: Office workers could be given specific time to go home and have sex 
To curb a birth deficit, employees will be given six hours of the working week devoted to lovemaking. 
Swedish Social Democrat party member Per Erik Muskos made the proposal during a council meeting in the northern region of Overtornea. 
He said during the meeting that mid-week sex breaks would improve office performance and boost childbirth. 10 health benefits of an orgasm Tuesday, 1st December 2015 An orgasm is good for your health and wellbeing, that's a fact! Read our 10 health benefits of an orgasm 1 / 10 Getty Images Having regular sex helps to cure the common cold “It will be a pleasure for both (man and woman) and should not be a marital duty” Per Erik Muskos 
The country already has a fitness hour to boost performance in the workplace. 
He said: "Childbirth should be encouraged. 
"When sex is also an excellent form of exercise with documented positive effects on wellbeing, the municipality should kill two birds with one stone and encourage employees to use their fitness hour to go home and have sex with their partner. 
"I believe sex is a scarce commodity in many long relationships. Everyday life is stressful and the children are at home. This could be an opportunity to have their own time ." 
Unfortunately for Mr Mustos and the horny workers of Sweden, his plans have been described as "embarrassing" by critics. How to give her the best orgasm of her life Tuesday, 6th December 2016 Become a master in the bedroom this weekend with our definitive guide to making her climax every time. 1 / 10 Getty Images Give importance to foreplay: Keep in mind that intercourse alone cannot lead to an epic orgasm. You need to dedicate enough time to foreplay. 
He added: "It will be a pleasure for both (man and woman) and should not be a marital duty . 
"I think this may be a way to have more time for each other.” Related articles
